name: Sisyphus Beetle Takes His Daughter to Work
name_original: Sisyphus Beetle Takes His Daughter to Work
description:
Sisyphus Beetle Takes His Daughter to Work

Meet Beetle Sisyphus , a nine to fiver at Beetle Corp, Hell Division. But when Take Your Kid to work day comes, He is upset to find his daughter, Sandra Bepis, thinks his job is lame. While he used to take pride in his work (pushing a ball of poop up a hill over and over), Dung Beetle Sisyphus now feels stuck in a rut so there is only one thing to do: Buy a time share so teens will think he is cool!

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/sisyphus-beetle-takes-his-daughter-to-wor...
